courses.name: Art and Science of Web Programming

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
details: Designed and implemented product usage metrics system with over 3 million data sets

Implemented dataflow of automated data ingestion system with Python scripts that migrate and merge data from various sources, validate and transforms into JSON, then fed into Elasticsearch for indexing and visualizing

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
details: Implemented patient chart for tracking patient records, such as diagnosis, treatment, and prescription
Drafted the UI prototype of an app that enforces coherent design across three different platforms (web, Android, iOS)

experience.title: Student Intern, User Experience/Graphic Design
details: Maintained the Student Affairs website (studentaffairs.illinois.edu) under two supervisors
Created paper and online publications to promote on-campus events and campaigns

projects.title: Crowd Research
details: Crowdsourced research hosted by Stanford on crowdsouring platforms, such as Mechanical Turk and ODesk, to diagnose existing issues and to build an improve platform

projects.title: Textbook Exchange
details: Collaborated with students with different disciplines (Computer Science, Business Management and Graphic design) to create an online hub that allows students to buy and sell textbooks
Designed and implemented data models, RESTful API for the backend, and client side UI

projects.title: Sherrand
details: Created a ride-sharing web app that is targeted towards college students based on locality and demand

projects.title: Fault Tolerant Distributed Key-Value Store
details: Implemented a distributed fault-tolerant key-value store using all-to-all membership protocol with emphasis on accuracy and completeness
